title: Dust Ruffled Bed Skirt with Split Corner 100% Microfiber Soft, Sheen & Wrinkle Free Bed Skirt Gathered Style Dust Ruffle Bed Skirt with 18" Drop Three Sided Coverage Bed Skirts (White-Queen)
features: PACKAGE INCLUDES: Leisure Lazing Split Corners Ruffled Bed Skirt Package Includes one piece of QUEEN Size Bed Skirt (60x80x18) inch.

DELIGHTFUL DESIGN : This Bedskirt features with gathered ruffles around 3 sides of bed for a classic, beautiful look. This Ruffle gathered Bed skirt is having Split Corners for the pretty appearance. It will hang nicely & helps to hide the space below bed and protect it from the dust.

QUALITY ASSURANCE: The Bed skirt Woven from the finest 100% Microfiber Yarns to ensure super soft luxurious Sheets which are long-lasting with a specialized finishing process to enhance the softness of the fabric.
Fabric is pre-shrunk, colorfast, and wrinkle-resistant for optimal longevity.
CARE INSTRUCTION: Machine wash in cold water with similar colors. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach.
